definitions.title: Def
definitions.body: II. [[חבע]] (√ of foll.; cf. Ar. s.aba9a point Lag:BN 20. 21 0’is.ba9un finger, Sab. [[אחבע]] DHM:ZMG xxxvii (1883), 375; Eth. 0as’b49t: NH = BH; Aram. [[אֶחְבְּעָא]] s.eb9to0, Mand. [[חבאתא]] Nö:M 36; Dl:Pr 172 Kö:ii. 1, 96 cp. As. ṣibû  II. surround firmly).
